comments.creator: sarentz@mozilla.com
comments.author: sarentz@mozilla.com
comments.text:
I'm trying to install the Ghostery add-on on my iMac with 7.0.1. The add-on manager allows me to find and install it but then after installing it shows a message "Ghostery is incompatible with Firefox 7.0.1". (Screenshot)

The strange thing is, this works perfectly fine on my other Mac, also with 7.0.1. I do exactly the same and can successfully install the add-on through the add-on manager without any problems.

https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/ghostery/

Which says:

Works with SeaMonkey 2.0a - 2.7a1, Firefox 3.5 - 10.0a1
